name: URL Validator
description: Should validate most URLs. Only a few cases fail, as you can see near the bottom.
content:
Sample text for testing:
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"'
12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42
555.123.4567	+1-(800)-555-2468
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk
www.demo.com	http://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar
https://sub-domain.site.com/catalog/3z2ce45f-6zcc-4b3z-b4a0-e9rr8dbbc60d/9.8.0.117.latest/
http://user:pass@10.10.1.10:3128
http://site.com/
http://site.com
site/repo/
site/repo
site
author: nakedhitman
